# Bug Fix

## Summary

- What was broken?
- What is the fix?

## Reproduction

- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Expected vs actual behavior

## Testing

- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] Manual verification steps described

## Risk

- [ ] Feature-flagged (if risky)
- [ ] Backwards compatible

## Checklist

- [ ] Added/updated tests
- [ ] No new lint warnings
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
